reviews.review: This game is a certified hood classic

piss is stored in the balls
uh
exelente juego
game fun

This game is just timeless, I mean, sure the graphics are old but even though they are textures from over 20 years ago they don't fail on delivering the creepy and lonely atmosphere of the game, to be honest they are even better because they are old. The level designs are great, albeit Xen is a little lacking. The Soundtracks are really good and they fit perfectly with what's happening, the weapons are really creative and the situations force you to change between them in a single fight, you can't just play doomguy and kill everyone with the shotgun. The story is engaging even though there are no cutscenes in the game. 10/10 I'd buy it again.

100% A classic game, pretty much any PC can run this - interesting AI mechanics and great atmosphere
it is so god it can run on very bad pcs and laptops

A nostalgic trip to the wonderful start that made Steam the behemoth it is today.

The physics are dated, but everything is full of charm, from the dialogue "why do we have to wear these ridiculous ties?", to the level design and atmosphere, to classic sound design, and to the pie you exploded in the breakroom.

It's just a great game through and through, and a revolutionary game for its time. 

I actually like it more than its sequel, Half-Life 2. 

9/10

good game. Only problem with it is that it gives me motion sickness and makes my headhurt but thats not the games fault its my brain being poopoo. Half life is a game that was way ahead of its time and was one of those games I had to play before I died. Amazing experience

A classic pioneer of the FPS genre alongside DOOM and Halo.
Even while working you can play the game during free time but that's up to your discretion and responsibility to be on time.
Not that I could relate but it's easy to get the hang of on easy mode, I leave Hard mode to the hardcore players, at least without cheats.
A must have for any gamers in the world.

It is surprising how good such an old game is.  It is better than most current First Person Shooters and works more smoothly than them.  And it cost practically nothing  bought with everything to do with Half-Life and Half-Life 2, so great value for money.  

In addition the tutorial is better than in most games of any genre but most controls are common to FPS games in general:  a 5 star game
